custom-action.name: Read GuiStatusbar (StatusBar)
custom-action.description:
This action reads the label of an SAP object and return the value in the response of the Action.
Possible parameters are: - objectId (optional): The SAP GUI object identifier. Default value is "ses[0]/". - column (optional): The column index of a table or the column name of a grid. - row (optional): The row index of a grid or a table. - nodeKey (optional): The node key of a tree. - itemName (optional): The item name of a tree. - windowId (optional): The SAP GUI window identifier. - objectName (optional): The SAP GUI object name. - objectType (optional): The SAP GUI object type. - textVariable (optional): The variable name of the text result. - typeVariable (optional): The variable name of the type result. Only used for status bar. Possible values are "Success", "Warning" and "Error".
